title: Frankenstein
author: Mary Shelley
description: A scientist creates a living being who struggles with rejection and identity.

title: Crime and Punishment
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
description: A man wrestles with guilt after committing a murder for an ideological cause.

title: Beloved
author: Toni Morrison
description: A former slave is haunted by her past and the ghost of her dead child.

title: The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle
author: Haruki Murakami
description: A man's mundane life becomes entangled with war memories and disappearing people.

title: Anne of Green Gables
author: L. M. Montgomery
description: An imaginative orphan finds a new home in Prince Edward Island.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A young nobleman becomes a messiah in a desert world of political intrigue.

title: The Secret Garden
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett
description: A lonely girl discovers a hidden garden that transforms her life.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
description: A journalist and hacker uncover a family’s dark secrets.

title: Norwegian Wood
author: Haruki Murakami
description: A student in Tokyo reflects on love, loss, and mental illness.

title: Fahrenheit 451
author: Ray Bradbury
description: A fireman questions society as he burns forbidden books.

title: Emma
author: Jane Austen
description: A clever woman plays matchmaker but misreads others’ feelings.

title: Dracula
author: Bram Stoker
description: A vampire from Transylvania comes to England, leaving a trail of fear.

title: The Handmaid’s Tale
author: Margaret Atwood
description: A woman resists oppression in a theocratic dictatorship.

title: The Brothers Karamazov
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
description: A family is torn apart by murder, faith, and existential questions.

title: The Martian
author: Andy Weir
description: A stranded astronaut uses science to survive on Mars.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A girl grows up isolated in the marsh, entangled in a murder case.

title: Never Let Me Go
author: Kazuo Ishiguro
description: Clones discover the truth about their existence and future.

title: Little Women
author: Louisa May Alcott
description: Four sisters grow up during the American Civil War.

title: The Night Circus
author: Erin Morgenstern
description: Two magicians compete in a magical circus that defies time.

title: Circe
author: Madeline Miller
description: The story of the sorceress Circe, reimagined from mythology.

title: The Bell Jar
author: Sylvia Plath
description: A young woman descends into depression while pursuing success.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A woman escapes a strict upbringing to pursue learning.

title: The Giver
author: Lois Lowry
description: A boy learns the dark truth behind his society’s sameness.

title: The Shadow of the Wind
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón
description: A boy finds a mysterious book and uncovers hidden secrets in post-war Barcelona.

title: White Teeth
author: Zadie Smith
description: Three families collide in modern London, exploring identity and heritage.
